articles.Title: SmartData Collective
articles.Description: As with all game-changing technologies, Big Data has the potential to be used for evil, as well as good. There are two common ways that “bad things” will often happen: malice, or maladministration. Sometimes big data technology is misused to deliberately cause harm to others, and sometimes it is simply used incorrectly, therefore causing harm.
